title: Womans zips past shoppers on mobility scooter for Aldi's Special Buys
text:
An elderly woman desperate to get her hands on Aldi's limited portable air conditioner has zipped past other customers on her mobility scooter.

A bunch of eager shoppers were waiting anxiously at the roller doors of the store in Adelaide's Collonnades Shopping Centre on Wednesday morning.

The mad rush was a result of one of Aldi's twice weekly 'Special Buys' which sees a range of products on offer for a limited time.

In a video shared to Instagram, the woman is seen speeding off into the store after the doors open, ducking her head to rush past the other shoppers (pictured)

In a video shared to Instagram, the woman is seen speeding off into the store after the doors open, ducking her head to rush past the other shoppers.

She then rides around the corner as other customers follow behind.

The video received more than 70,000 views in a matter of hours.

'Worth it though, that portable air con is unreal,' one person commented.

'Seriously, probably me in 50 years!' another said.

Every Wednesday and Saturday the store offers various items at low prices from clothing to furniture and electronics.

The stocks are limited so customers are urged to get in quickly so they don't miss out.

The portable air conditioner was on offer for $399.

The elderly woman was so eager to get her hands on one of the products at Aldi she zipped through the store on her mobility scooter
